inputs.note:
Patient: Robert Johnson
DOB: 01/30/1971 | MRN: MRN-0031

Subjective: 55M presents with progressive fatigue, muscle weakness, and intermittent palpitations x2 weeks. Denies chest pain or SOB.

PMH: CKD Stage 3b (eGFR 38), Hypertension, Heart Failure (EF 35%)
Allergies: Sulfa drugs

Objective:
  Vitals: BP 155/95, HR 72 (irregular), Temp 37.0°C
  CV: Irregularly irregular rhythm, no murmurs
  Ext: 1+ bilateral pedal edema

Assessment: Hyperkalemia in setting of CKD + ACEi + K-sparing diuretic

Plan:
  - Continue current medications
  - Recheck BMP in 1 week
  - Low-potassium diet counseling
inputs.labs:

Creatinine: 2.4 mg/dL (H)
eGFR: 38 mL/min (L)
BUN: 42 mg/dL (H)
Magnesium: 1.6 mg/dL (L)
inputs.meds:
